mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ky_order_review (user_id, store_id, product_id, sku_id, order_id, anonymous, review_star, logistics_star, store_star, review_content, review_time, reply_status, reply_content, reply_time) VALUES (#{order.userId}, #{order.storeId}, #{order.productId}, #{order.skuId}, #{order.orderId}, #{order.anonymous}, #{order.reviewStar}, #{order.logisticsStar}, #{order.storeStar}, #{order.reviewContent}, #{order.reviewTime}, #{order.replyStatus}, #{order.replyContent}, #{order.replyTime})
mapper.select: SELECT rev.review_id reviewId, us.id userId, us.avatar, us.nick_name nickName, rev.anonymous, GROUP_CONCAT(det.sku_spec) FROM ky_order_review rev LEFT JOIN ky_user_info us ON us.id = rev.user_id LEFT JOIN ky_order_detail det ON det.order_id = rev.order_id WHERE store_id = 1 GROUP BY rev.review_id,us.avatar,us.nick_name LIMIT 0,10
